ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons white balsamic vinegar,   +   1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 8 ounces grape tomatoes, halved, 3 cups arugula, 1 cup sliced red onion, 2 pounds watermelon, cubed, 4 ounces feta cheese, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 3g 15%, Cholesterol 13mg 4%, Sodium 284mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 9g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 15mg 77%, Calcium 96mg 7%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 237mg 5%
